scripts.build: tsc -b && vite build && npm run electron:build
scripts.electron:build: npx esbuild electron/main.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=cjs --outfile=dist-electron/main.cjs --external:electron && npx esbuild electron/preload.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=cjs --outfile=dist-electron/preload.cjs --external:electron
scripts.electron:wait: wait-on tcp:5173 && npm run electron:build && cross-env ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron .
